DOC.brief_summary: Coleus forskohlii extract contains the bioactive compound, forskolin. Preliminary studies have shown that forskolin can increase fat metabolism thus reduce fat accumulation in both animals and humans. It has been suggested that forskolin may also suppress appetite thus reduce energy intake and results in weight loss. This study will evaluate the appetite suppressant properties of Coleus forskohlii extract. In addition the effect on central obesity and risk factors of metabolic syndrome will also be investigated.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Coleus Forskohlii Extract on the Risk Factors of Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Both Australian males and females, age 2060 years, Overweight or obese (BMI >25), waist circumference of > 94 cm (male), waist circumference of >80 cm (female) Cigarette smoker, hypertension, all types of heart, liver and kidney disease, pregnancy, lactating, Type 1 diabetes and weight loss medication.
